targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_responses_total:overview{job="nginx-ingress-controller", status_code="1xx"}[$__range])) by (namespace) / (sum(increase(nginx_responses_total:overview{job="nginx-ingress-controller"}[$__range])) by (namespace) > 0) or (sum(increase(nginx_responses_total:overview{job="nginx-ingress-controller"}[$__range])) by (namespace) > bool 0)
